EmailTemplate.description: Response for November 2011 RR webinar on insider risk
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Nov11 Risk Roundtable Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the Risk Roundtable Webinar. The login details are below.
Title: Managing Insider Risk Date: Tuesday, November 29 Time: 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern / 5pm GMT
Video:
Conference URL: http://www.infiniteconferencing.com/join Participant Code: 97447854
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: US/Canada: (888) 567-1603 UK: 00 800 4747 4646 (You will not need to give the operator a passcode, just the title of the webinar)
http://www.intapp.com All information Copyright 2011 IntApp, Inc. All rights reserved.
